summary: IGNITION KEY GETS STUCK IN THE ON POSITION AND CANNOT TURN THE CAR OFF.  IT ALSO STICKS WHEN OFF AND CANNOT GET THE CAR STARTED.  IN A WEB SEARCH I FIND THAT THIS IS A COMMON PROBLEM.  THE COST TO REPLACE IS ~$800    THIS IS A REPEATED PROBLEM AND HAPPENS ON AN ALMOST DAILY BASIS. VW CLAIMS THERE IS NO RECALL.  IN MY OPINION, THIS IS A MAJOR SAFETY ISSUE AND SHOULD HAVE A RECALL.
